VERY_SHORT.string: Pakistan Centralizes Military Power Under Asim Munir

SHORT.string: Pakistan has passed the 27th constitutional amendment, granting Army Chief Asim Munir the permanent rank of Field Marshal and creating a new Chief of Defence Forces (CDF) position. This centralizes control of the army, navy, and airforce under him, a move analysts link to perceived Indian military preparations and potential future conflict. Historical precedent suggests such power consolidation in Pakistan has preceded wars with India. The video also discusses future tensions, including possible water scarcity issues by 2026 that could escalate India-Pakistan disputes. The host concludes by promoting a data analyst course collaboration between his channel and IBM.
